snippet: A decision limits the enforcement options of Finra, an important Wall Street regulator, just as it is under pressure to impose greater accountability on brokers and firms.
lead_paragraph: A decision limits the enforcement options of Finra, an important Wall Street regulator, just as it is under pressure to impose greater accountability on brokers and firms.

headline.main: Court Says Regulator Exceeded Its Power
headline.print_headline: Court Says Regulator Exceeded Its Power
headline.seo: Court Rules Against Finra on Enforcement Actions
